title: doc: document godoc HTML conversion rules
body:
by **raul.san@sent.com**: 
In http://golang.org/doc/articles/godoc_documenting_go_code.html there are some rules
that Godoc uses to converting comments to HTML but it's incomplete.

"athcing the output "http://golang.org/cmd/go/"; from
"http://golang.org/src/cmd/go/doc.go";,
how are added the titles such as "Compile packages and dependencies"? I would
say that with 2 blank lines to separate paragraphas. And it could have other more rule
that I've lost.
